description:
Are you ready for Christmas? If you are like me and need some help with planning and budgeting, this app is for you. Set a budget and start your list. Add as many people as you wish. Now all you need to do is add gifts. Enter how much each gift cost and it will be deducted from the budget you set. You can add more then one gift per person. If you have a link to a website for a gift, you can enter the site and the app will setup a link so you can see if a sale price has changed.  You can edit or change gifts at any time.

You can see how many days you have till Christmas for that last minute gift.
The app plays some really nice music to get you in the Christmas sprit.
The wallpaper changes every minute with 8 different Christmas wallpapers.

Please do not use the "Enter Key" on the Touchpad's key board. Use the save buttons. Tap somewhere on the screen after you enter budget amount. it will auto update with the new input.

Fixed calculating the days till Christmas correctly.
Thanks Steve for pointing this out.

Fixed so that snow will start with the app.
